channel.title: Placing text?
channel.description:
Alright well i want to place text somewhere on a page. I can do that but it stays in that spot no matter what so if i resize the window the background moves but the text stays. I was wondering how to make it so it moves when the window resizes.
move to web design please :)

item.title: Placing text?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:2, topic:178812”]What the hell are you talking about?
A website?
Photoshop?
Notepad?!?!?

Pictures and better vocabulary will help explain it alot better.[/quote]

sorry rofl thought this was in web design i swear to god i was in there…

also explain to me how you do not understand this?
